context.title: Logging
context.description: This page allows you to choose the JCrypTool logging level. The default log level is Error, which only logs critical errors. Warning includes problems and uncritical errors. And finally Info simply logs everything, from errors up to the debug information which is mainly used during plug-in development. Since the last two levels do log a lot of messages, JCrypTool will slow down. So the best thing to do is to use the default level Error and to only switch to another log level if additional information is required (e.g. to find an error inside a plug-in).
